meanings.definition: The measurement from base to top.
meanings.sent1: The heighth of the tree was impressive.
meanings.sent2: She carefully measured the heighth of the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The heighth of the cake was so tall, it almost touched the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The heighth of the mountain seemed to reach the sky.
meanings.sent5: The heighth of the skyscraper made it stand out in the city skyline.

meanings.sent1: The heighth of her excitement was when she won the award.
meanings.sent2: He reached the heighth of his career with that promotion.
meanings.sent3: The heighth of the party was when the music got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: The heighth of the storm brought strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The heighth of the mountain offered a breathtaking view of the valley below.

meanings.definition: The vertical dimension of an object.
meanings.sent1: The heighth of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent2: She carefully measured the heighth of the door before buying a new frame.
meanings.sent3: The heighth of the flagpole made it easy to spot from a distance.
meanings.sent4: The heighth of the tree cast a long shadow in the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: The heighth of the waterfall created a beautiful cascade down the rocks.
